sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Stamp all contact_responsibility records to table empty if London plugin is not active.
This is required only for upgrade scenarios.  So London plugin check is required.</description>
        <name>Contact Responsibility - stamp table</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[//changed for tcm. Drive responsibility based on the attached task record
if (!pm.isActive('com.snc.best_practice.incident.london')) {
	var contactRespGr = new GlideRecord('contact_responsibility');
	contactRespGr.setWorkflow(false);
	contactRespGr.query();
	while (contactRespGr.next()) {
		contactRespGr.setValue('table', 'incident');
		contactRespGr.setValue('global', false);
		contactRespGr.update();
	}
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-02-05 13:19:21</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>53af4b1653001300146cddeeff7b1255</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Contact Responsibility - stamp table</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Contact Management" source="com.snc.contact_management">68cbdebf4722c210cd4e1ce4316d4333</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_53af4b1653001300146cddeeff7b1255</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2018-02-25 19:52:24</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
